name: Spirit Chase (ByteSizePlay)
description:
Spirit Chase

Spirit Chase is a Local-Multiplayer game built for the GameDev.Tv Game Jam. It's multiplayer ONLY, so you must have at least 2 players in order play (sorry!). It uses Unity's new Input system and so it should support most controllers (and one of you could use a Keyboard).

Anyway, to the good stuff...

"In this game, death is only the beginning... You must die, then hunt!"

The idea of this game is to collect an Ancient Relic, which causes you to die and become a vengeful spirit. You then, have a limited time to hunt down the rest of the players before turning back to normal. The player with the highest points at the end of the match - wins!

If you can outrun the ghost however, you'll gain HUGE points. So the choice is yours...

I hope you enjoy it. Please let me know your thoughts :) Feel free to check out the trailer for some gameplay footage!!

I kind of ran out of time towards the end, and so I had to slap together a pretty rushed stage, along with a lack of real polish. A lesson to be learnt for next time.

Here are a list of some of the Assets I used;

Synty Studios POLYGON Starter Pack.

Lowpoly Ghost - Codewart Game Assets

Fantasy Skybox - Render Knight

Basic Emotions - Kevin Iglesias

(There are a few other Assets in the source code, but I didn't end up using them).
